column5: Has anyone ever fished On any of the lkes in the Brightsands river area. These lake include Metionga, Harmon, Pakashkan, ect... Looking for northern, walleye, and lake trout. Any info would be helpful.
When are you planning on going? this may or may not help, just a thought. I have fished there in the middle of july before and it has been good jigging for walleyes around rock piles. Bassinboy
I was thinking of going In early June next year.

Like I said, I don't know exactly what to expect that early, but we have always been very successful with bright colored jig heads and leaches for walleyes and trolling around the islands with crankbaits or spoons for northerns. Bassinboy
